Class: Index

WinJSContrib.Search. Index

This class is the heart of the search engine. operations performed by this object are synchronous but exposes as promises. This way Index is almost interchangeable with WinJSContrib.Search.IndexWorkerProxy

new Index(name, definition)

Search index

Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string

index name
definition WinJSContrib.Search.IndexDefinition

index definition
